Fault.name: Mediator.mplan
Fault.msg: Case "ConsultarTodas.consultartodas_client.ConsultarPessoas" doesnt have any payload transformation Please make sure source and target message part name are same and of same type. Otherwise, target reference may fail to execute with error message like "Input sourcelike Null" or "Part not found"

Fault.name: ConsultarPorID.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns3:TbPessoa" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.
